column1: The  learned  Senior  Deputy Solicitor General  submitted that the TAC  Act  does  not spell  out the
consequences  arising from the failure  of the TAC  to adhere to the time limit and  relied  on  the

[(1984)  2  Sri.L.R.  172]  and 
decisions 
in  Jayanetti  v.  Land  Reform  Commission  and  others

[(1982)  2  Sri.L.R.  693]  as  well  as  an  extract 
Ramalingam  v.  Thangarajah 
from  Bindra  on
Interpretation of Statutes [12 th  Ed.,  page 314].
